tool_description:
Spotify, Apple Music, YouTube, Amazon, Tidal, and more. Over 19 services supported.

Fetch metadata for the tracks, albums, playlists from multiple streaming services via URL.
Use single search endpoints to find at once on all services and get sharable URLs to all of them. 

MusicAPI.com
name: MusicAPI
title: MusicAPI

api_list.name: /public/search/introspection
api_list.description: Allows you to fetch all different enums needed for sending API requests
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://musicapi13.p.rapidapi.com/public/search/introspection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "musicapi13.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://musicapi13.p.rapidapi.com/public/search/introspection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "musicapi13.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
